summary: Completed comprehensive testing of auto-title generation feature. All core functionality working correctly including title auto-updates from aspects, manual editing flag, regenerate button, and preview functionality.
passed_tests: Draft loads with title_manually_edited field (defaults to false)
Title excludes Unknown/N/A values from auto-generation
Preview fetches fresh data with cache-busting
Manual title editing sets titleManuallyEdited flag and shows Manual badge
Regenerate title button resets title and clears manual flag
Changing Brand aspect auto-updates title when not manually edited
Preview button saves draft before navigating
Preview page displays updated title correctly
HTML source toggle works in preview

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor DOM attachment issue on HTML toggle, but functionality works)
